doc.title: Jefferies
doc.source_uri: 2025-08-31/Key Takeaways from Investor Session in Chengdu Key Takeaways from Investor Session in Chengdu_2025-08-31

passages.text: China (PRC) | Internet Kuaishou

Highlights include (1) Kling focuses on technology and product innovations amid rising AI penetration of a very large addressable market; (2) Kling's iterations, based on user feedback, enhance monetization; (3) Kling steps up efforts in localized operations in overseas markets; (4) content + ecommerce is a key differentiation; (5) external ad driven by multiple sectors, with ROI key to advertisers; (6) OneRec enhances matching efficiencies.

Increasing AI penetration of a very large addressable market; Iterations enhance user experience and monetization. Kling highlights that video generation models are a huge market, as demonstrated by multiple players entering the sector. There are still many areas that can be enhanced to satisfy user needs. Kling focuses on (a) technology; and (b) product innovation amid focused strategy. It is a tier 1 player in the video generation model and considers there to be three stages of R&D: (1) authentic visual effects; (2) controllability; (3) customization of characters. Kling focuses on the first two at the moment and aims to enable users to be video directors. On iterations, it is based on user feedback, and monetization should be enhanced by the upgrade. The addressable market is USD140bn, among which AI is expected to penetrate USD20- 30bn in three years' time. In the future, AI is expected to penetrate as much as \(50\%\) of the market. Kling has good model performance, which is key to user engagement. Overseas users have better paying behavior. It will step up the effects in localization to satisfy needs across various countries.

Content + E- commerce is key differentiation. KS enhances consumers' mindshare, meeting their needs with a focus on operations. On pan- shelf- based e- commerce, these include (a) aims to increase % of GMV contributions, offers merchants with KOL at different commission rates, and reinvests in the ecosystem; (b) On advertising, it strengthens infrastructure and educates merchants about benefits as a priority; (c) It explores an automatic ad budget system backed by AI in 2H. AIGC is important to SME merchants as they can have 24- hour live- streaming at a lower cost (vs hiring broadcasters with similar performance). AIGC provides more marketing materials for selection by merchants.

OneRec enhances matching efficiencies. Management highlights that both public and private traffic are growing well with good user engagement, thanks to satisfying user preferences on different content offerings. OneRec is an end- to- end generative recommendation model that upgrades matching efficiencies. It covers \(20\%\) of traffic today and aims to reach \(50 - 60\%\) in future. External ads, growth momentum benefits from verticals, including short play and games as well as lead generation, such as local services. Contribution from food delivery is not meaningful. KS's performance- based ad is a key contributor, and ROI is key to advertisers in a budget allocation. KS leverages AI and data insights from merchants' marketing materials in past years to enhance content offerings and matching efficiencies with consumers

We would like to thank Fiona Fan, employee of Evaluaserve Inc., for providing research support services to our preparation of this report. We would like to thank Han Wang, employee of Evaluaserve Inc., for providing research support services to our preparation of this report We would like to thank Erica Qiu, employee of Evaluaserve Inc., for providing research support services to our preparation of this report.

KuaishouKuaishou is one of the leading live- streaming platforms globally by gross billings from virtual gifting, average live- streaming MPU, average DAU, and live- streaming e- commerce GMV. Its mission is to become China's most customer- focused company to meet its users' needs. Kuaishou Flagship (2011) and Kuaishou Express (2019) are the company's two most popular apps, designed to cater to different user needs, in line with the company's philosophy of embracing all lifestyles.

We have a Buy rating and HKD94 PT based on SOTP valuation. Risks include (1) slower- than- expected growth in the number of users and time spent due to intense competition and disruptive innovation; (2) macro headwinds leading to softer- than- expected advertising growth; and (3) stringent regulations.
(Article 3(1)e and Article 9 of MAR) Recommendation Published Recommended published

- Describes securities that we expect to provide a total return (price appreciation plus yield) of 15% or more within a 12-month period. Hold - Describes securities that we expect to provide a total return (price appreciation plus yield) of plus 15% or minus 10% within a 12-month period. Underperform - Describes securities that we expect to provide a total return (price appreciation plus yield) of minus 10% or less within a 12-month period. The expected total return (price appreciation plus yield) for Buy rated securities with an average security price consistently below \(10 is 20\%\) or more within a 12-month period as these companies are typically more volatile than the overall stock market. For Hold rated securities with an average security price consistently below \(10, the expected total return (price appreciation plus yield) is plus or minus 20% within a 12-month period. For Underperform rated securities with an average security price consistently below\) 10, the expected total return (price appreciation plus yield) is minus 20% or less within a 12-month period.
NR - The investment rating and price target have been temporarily suspended. Such suspensions are in compliance with applicable regulations and/or Jefferies policies.
CS - Coverage Suspended. Jefferies has suspended coverage of this company.

NC - Not covered. Jefferies does not cover this company Restricted - Describes issuers where, in conjunction with Jefferies engagement in certain transactions, company policy or applicable securities regulations prohibit certain types of communications, including investment recommendations. Monitor - Describes securities whose company custodians and financials are being monitored, and for which no financial projections or opinions on the investment merits of the company are provided.

Jefferies methodology for assigning ratings may include the following: market capitalization, maturity, growth/value, volatility and expected total return over the next 12 months. The price targets are based on several methodologies, which may include, but are not restricted to, analyses of market risk, growth rate, revenue stream, discounted cash flow (DCF), EBITDA, EPS, cash flow (CF), free cash flow (FCF), EV/EBITDA, P/E, PE/growth, P/CF, P/FCF, premium (discount)/average group EV/EBITDA, premium (discount)/average group P/E, sum of the parts, net asset value, dividend returns, and return on equity (ROE) over the next 12 months.

Jefferies Franchise PicksJefferies Franchise Picks include stock selections from among the best stock ideas from our equity analysts over a 12 month period. Stock selection is based on fundamental analysis and may take into account other factors such as analyst conviction, differentiated analysis, a favorable risk/reward ratio and investment themes that Jefferies analysts are recommending. Jefferies Franchise Picks will include only Buy rated stocks and the number can vary depending on analyst recommendations for inclusion. Stocks will be added as new opportunities arise and removed when the reason for inclusion changes, the stock has met its desired return, if it is no longer rated Buy and/or if it triggers a stop loss. Stocks having 120 day volatility in the bottom quartile of S&P stocks will continue to have a 15% stop loss, and the remainder will have a 20% stop. Franchise Picks are not intended to represent a recommended portfolio of stocks and is not sector based, but we may note where we believe a Pick falls within an investment style such as growth or value.
Kuaishou Technology (1024 HK: HK\$75.35, BUY)
